result.execSummary:
The defendant Brandon A. Gaston was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Offender - Fail/Update Information, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Eau Claire County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
**74 days credit if probation revoked.**

If Probation or Extended Supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

miscConds.notes:
Maintain updated information with the Sex Offender registry. 
Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations. 
Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge.
PAYABLE DIRECTLY TO AND COLLECTED BY EAU CLAIRE COUNTY CLERK OF COURT.  NOT A CONDITION OF PROBATION.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon A. Gaston

records.addlTxt: Reminder Notice, Report for DNA Sample Slip - Return to Sender, Not Deliverable as Addressed, Unable to Forward
Reminder Notice indicating amount due mailed to defendant with DNA form.
Same as Complaint.
*See Plea Hearing docket.*

(1:37 PM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Andrew Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Brandon A. Gaston in court, in custody. 
State notes the Public Defender's Office has been unable to secure representation for the defendant at this time.
Defendant advises is on a PO Hold and has cases out of another county pending.
Defendant requests bond modification. 
State advises hasn't made an offer on this case yet. State also advises has released the officer since the defendant doesn't have counsel.
Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver. 
Defendant advised of right to an attorney. Defendant advises is waiving right to counsel.
Defendant pleads Guilty to Count 1: Sex Offender - Fail/Update Information.
Defendant is advised of charges, maximum penalties, elements of the crime(s) and constitutional rights. 
Court accepts the defendant's Guilty plea and finds the defendant Guilty of Count 1.

Court withholds sentence and places the defendant on probation for 2 years with the following conditions:
Maintain updated information with the Sex Offender registry. Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations. Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge and pay court costs. 74 days credit if probation revoked.
The Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender Services. Despite best efforts, the State Public Defender Office has not yet secured representation for this Defendant.
Notice of Hearing - Return to Sender, No Such Number, Unable to Forward

2:07 PM Defendant Brandon A. Gaston in court, in custody without counsel.  Attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for State of Wisconsin. Court finds good cause to continue this case as the defendant has not yet been assigned counsel from the Public Defender's Office. 

Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on June 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
The Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender Services. Despite best efforts, the State Public Defender Office has not yet secured representation for this Defendant.

1:28 PM case called. Prosecuting attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon A. Gaston appeared by video, in custody from Dane County. 
The defendant still doesn't have an attorney assigned by the SPD. Defendant is okay with re scheduling.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on June 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
The Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender Services. Despite best efforts, the State Public Defender Office has not yet secured representation for this Defendant.

(2:44 PM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Tiffany Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Brandon A. Gaston in court, in custody. Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Brandon A. Gaston.
Attorney Rivard moves to withdraw as counsel due to a conflict that was discovered on last Friday.
Court orders Attorney Rivard is withdrawn and the Public Defender's Office is to appoint new counsel.
Court finds good cause to continue the preliminary hearing.
Defendant advises is on a PO Hold.
Preliminary Hearing scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 1:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on May 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
SPD Appointment - Attorney Francis Rivard

11:02 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon A. Gaston appeared by video, in custody in Dane County. 
Defendant advised of charges/potential penalties. Defendant makes a statement regarding their ties to Eau Claire. State requests $5,000 cash bond- Court orders $5,000 cash bond. . Defendant is on a P.O. hold. 
A preliminary hearing is scheduled for 4-19-22 at 2:00 PM.
